name: ComFi
overview:
ComFi was established in 1998 in effort to help travelers and expatriates call their loved ones abroad.

ComFi offers a wide range of telecommunications services: Phone Cards, Prepaid Wireless Refills, Web-Callback and PC to Phone. Online calling cards, one of the bestselling products, help consumers to save significantly on international and long distance calls, avoiding charges from their regular mobile or land line providers.

Direct Dial, ComFi’s flagship product, is designed to eliminate the need to dial complex and long international phone numbers, access numbers and PINs. It allows customers to save dedicated US phone number in address book and call directly.

Company takes the commitment to offering quality phone cards seriously and has developed relationships with only premium telecommunication carriers who subscribe to the high standards set by the consumer base.
